availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Mercer County. Owned seven slaves in 1860.

Spouse: Lucretia Irvine (Starnes)
Children: James F Irvine, Sarah Irvine, Decy A Irvine, Samuel W Irvine, Benjamin B Irvine

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, page 112.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, James Brewster Irvine, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=58178488&ref=acom accessed 03/13/2017.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedule, Kentucky, Mercer County, District 2, page 6.
